title: Everyone Just Simmer Down ( Polo G Interview)
itunes:title: Everyone Just Simmer Down ( Polo G Interview)
description:
Today on the show we had Polo G stop by where he spoke about Talks New Music, Kicking Drug Habits, Chicago Investments, Juice WRLD Friendship and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to an Ohio Physician who Tried To Prove Vaccinations Give You Magnetic Powers and we opened up the phone lines for our married listeners to see if they are allowed to go out with their single friends based off their interview with Bow- Wow and Ray J.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
